subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: St. John’s Coach Steve Lavin got another significant lift with the commitment of Jakarr Sampson, a 6-foot-8 wing player considered to be one of the top-25 high school players in the nation.
snippet: St. John’s Coach Steve Lavin got another significant lift with the commitment of Jakarr Sampson, a 6-foot-8 wing player considered to be one of the top-25 high school players in the nation.
